mapper.select: SELECT MAPID, MAPNAME, MAPCOUNT, MAPMINN, MAPMAXN, MAPVER, MAPCRT, MAPMANA, STRID FROM STRUMF WHERE STRID=#{strid}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO STRUMF( MAPNAME, MAPMINN, MAPMAXN, MAPVER, MAPCRT, MAPMANA, STRID ) VALUES( #{mapname}, #{mapminn}, #{mapmaxn}, #{mapver}, #{mapcrt, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mapmana}, #{strid} )
